name: WiserforIndia
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Dining light”
”Alexa, set Dimmer to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Wiser for India is an Alexa skill for connecting Z-wave Gateway with smart home skill.
Login and enabling Wiser for India will allow your Z-Wave Gateway to connect with Alexa.
With the Wiser for India skill, if you have any connected lights, switches or other Z-wave devices attached to your smart home Z-wave Gateway, you can activate them by saying "Alexa, turn on the Dining light", Alexa and smart home Z-wave gateway will then make it happen.
 
Try saying...
 
"Alexa, Turn on Bedroom lights"
 
"Alexa, set Dimmer to 50%"
